name: ACKsteroids!
description:
W - Thrust

A, D - Turn

[SPACE] - Shoot

[ESC] - Escape from the torment of this unbearably bare-bones game (aka. quit)

I saw a tweet (can't remember who made it) about how important finishing small projects is and decided to make lots of small games focusing on a small ideas instead of daydreaming about big ones without doing anything
